SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CustomInfoContributor
The CustomInfoContributor class is a Spring component that dynamically enriches the information exposed by the /actuator/info endpoint.
GlobalHandlerException
This class centralizes the handling of exceptions across the application, providing consistent error responses for validation errors and custom exceptions.
JsonDataInitializer
The JsonDataInitializer class is a Spring Boot component responsible for initializing the application with sample note data from a JSON file.
MnotesApplication
Main application class for the *MNotes* microservice, part of the *MicroDiab* project.
Note
Represents a patient note stored in the MongoDB database.
NoteController
REST Controller for managing notes related to patients.
NoteRepository
Repository interface for managing Note entities in MongoDB.
NoteService
Service class for managing Note entities in the *MicroDiab* application.
RequestLoggingFilter
Custom request logging filter for the *mnotes* microservice in the *MicroDiab* project.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for security settings in the mnotes microservice.
TracingHelper
Helper class for managing tracing spans and tags in a Spring Boot application.
WebConfig
Configuration class for customizing Spring MVC web configuration.
